title: Black Screen
body: Yesterday, I was opening league (the new updated one) and then it suddenly froze before it could load and go to the login page. I've heard some people having the black screen problem before a game but this is right after I click the league icon on my computer. I tried to close it but I don't know how to do that either since there is no X button on the black screen. Please help >.< I really want to play but it just won't load.

I am having the same problem did you find a fix?

Black screens can happen in a few places like the loading screen, login screen, and elsewhere.  It's usually caused by a network problem that can't download items or assets so you end up with a black screen instead.  Start off with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article to help rule our possibilities towards a fix.  Let me know how that goes for you!

Thank you for the link to the connection issues article! I have checked my network to see if there has been any problems but so far there hasn't been any. But sadly, my league still is on the same black screen as it was for the past 3 days and won't close, load or do anything else. ):

Thanks for the update!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look at your case individually.   It would greatly help as well to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which will offer some logs for context.  Attach it to your ticket, and we'll get back to you!
